attributes.action: President Trump should be given a Full State Visit
attributes.additional_details: The USA is the UK’s greatest friend, President Trump is the democratically elected President....the people’s choice and as such should be treated with the respect his position holds.        We the people of the UK request that President Trump is invited to the UK,  given a full state visit, he should also be given the honour of addressing  Parliament and the people of the UK.
attributes.background: Give President Trump the respect his position holds
